original_text: So he took his men, divided them into three companies and set an ambush in the fields. When he saw the people coming out of the city, he rose to attack them.
korean_text: 아비멜렉이 자기 백성을 세 무리로 나누어 밭에 매복시켰더니 백성이 성에서 나오는 것을 보고 일어나 그들을 치되

sentences.original_text: and set an ambush in the fields
When he saw the people coming out of the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 성에서 나오는 사람들을 보았을 때
